column4: hey guys. Bit of a long shot but I have this program called navifirm, it's for finding firmware for nokia phones. and for the life of me I can't get it running in Wine though I know it has been done. Anyone got any ideas how to at least get the program open?
Last try before I go back to google :P
Ahwell. I'll just wait till I build my misses' comp to get new firmware since she wants XP. I refuse to dual boot :P
what was it that you needed to install?
